announcements.title: Welcome to the New Skyesoft Office Board
announcements.message: The new Office Bulletin Board is now live. Real-time metrics, active permits, and daily KPIs are fully automated and updated through the Skyesoft SSE engine.

announcements.title: Reminder: Morning Huddle at 7:45 AM
announcements.message: A brief team huddle will take place in the conference area at 7:45 AM to review today's installs and production schedule.
